title: (x) Important Information Enclosed - FF DIN {Romesh}
content:
Trying to figure out what this font may be. The closest I've come is Din. Help!   
   
- thanks!   
   
   
 ![scannedmats](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000626im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/70225.jpg)
author: denali

comments.content: why do you think its not din? i can't see a difference between [ff din bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000626/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=FF.9467.14.4&attributes.sampleSize=32&sampleText=Important+Enclosed&sampleSize=32) and your sample.

I guess it all depends what version of Din you use. I was looking at DIN 1451 Mittelschrift rather than your standard Din. Level of confusion: 5   
   
Thanks!

I agree Yves, however I'm trying to match a client's typface for a proposal.   
   
Thanks again.

Come on, come on, Yves! Today you'll get your first 5.000. Mt. Everest is at the tip of your finger!   
   
: )
